head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COOPER, JOY RHODES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COOPER, JOY RHODES

block.p: COOPER-Joy Rhodes, of Millwood, NY on January 24, 2000. Mrs. Cooper was a former U.N. Representative of the Overseas Education Fund of the League of Women Voters, active board member of the Bancroft School, in Haddonfield, NJ, and an Executive V.P. of Whiteswan Uniforms in Yonkers. She is the wife of the late Richard L. Cooper and is survived by two children, Lar Cooper of Marlton, NJ, and Pat Rowen of Redmond, WA, Two grandchildren, Geoff and Katie Rowen, and life long friend Jeanette Simmons, of Brentwood, CA. Funeral services and interment were private. Donations to Cooper Foundation for Developmental Diseases, 22922 N.E. 14th St., Redmond, WA 98053 would be appreciated.
